mapper.select: SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, oc.order_compost_phone AS orderCompostPhone, oc.order_compost_address AS orderCompostAddress, oc.order_compost_amount AS orderCompostAmount, oc.order_compost_date AS orderCompostDate, ocd.order_compost_delivery_status AS orderCompostDeliveryStatus FROM order_compost_delivery ocd INNER JOIN order_compost oc ON oc.order_compost_idx = ocd.order_compost_idx INNER JOIN company_info ci ON oc.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx;

SELECT oc.username AS username, oc.order_compost_idx AS orderCompostIdx, oc.company_contract_idx AS companyContractIdx, oc.company_info_idx AS companyInfoIdx, oc.inventory_idx AS inventoryIdx, oc.order_compost_content AS orderCompostContent, ci.company_info_name as companyInfoName, oc.order_compost_phone as orderCompostPhone, oc.order_compost_address as orderCompostAddress, oc.order_compost_amount as orderCompostAmount, oc.order_compost_date as orderCompostDate, COALESCE(occ.order_compost_confirm_status , '대기중') AS orderCompostConfirmStatus FROM order_compost oc INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = oc.company_info_idx LEFT JOIN order_compost_confirm occ ON occ.order_compost_idx = oc.order_compost_idx WHERE occ.order_compost_confirm_status IS NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_compost_delivery( order_compost_idx, username, company_info_idx, order_compost_delivery_track, -- 운송장번호 order_compost_delivery_status, -- 배송 상태 order_compost_delivery_company, -- 택배회사 order_compost_delivery_complete -- 배송 예정날짜 )VALUES(#{orderCompostIdx},#{username},#{companyInfoIdx},#{orderCompostDeliveryTrack},'P',#{orderCompostDeliveryCompany},now());
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT oc.order_compost_idx AS orderCompostIdx, oc.username as username, oc.company_info_idx AS companyInfoIdx, ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, oc.order_compost_phone AS orderCompostPhone, oc.order_compost_address AS orderCompostAddress, oc.order_compost_amount AS orderCompostAmount, oc.order_compost_date AS orderCompostDate, occ.order_compost_confirm_content AS orderCompostConfirmContent, occ.order_compost_confirm_status AS orderCompostConfirmStatus, CASE WHEN ocd.order_compost_delivery_status IS NULL THEN 'O' WHEN ocd.order_compost_delivery_status = 'P' THEN 'P' WHEN ocd.order_compost_delivery_status = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE ocd.order_compost_delivery_status END AS orderCompostDeliveryStatus FROM order_compost_confirm occ INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = occ.company_info_idx INNER JOIN order_compost oc ON oc.order_compost_idx = occ.order_compost_idx LEFT JOIN order_compost_delivery ocd ON oc.order_compost_idx = ocd.order_compost_idx;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_compost_confirm( ORDER_compost_idx, username, company_info_idx, order_compost_confirm_status, order_compost_confirm_content, admin_username, -- 승인 어드민 아이디 order_compost_confirm_date -- 승인날짜 )VALUES(#{orderCompostIdx},#{userName},#{companyInfoIdx},#{orderCompostConfirmStatus},#{orderCompostConfirmContent},#{adminUsername},now());
